Params[3]: Tch...
Camu roars angrily, launching heavy blows at Roland with the greatsword in his hand.
Hah... Thought you could only bark like some rabid dog, turns out you can bite.
Roland grits his teeth to fend off another blow from Camu, but his stance is getting unsteady, even beginning to tilt back uncontrollably.
Turn this frame! Back to! What it was! Now!
Roland draws his shotgun to fire six shots at Camu's face, then uses the opening to leap backwards.
Well, well. Looks like you'll be quite the hassle to euthanize.
Whatever. It's you, or me!
Camu is about to swing his greatsword at Roland's face, when dull mechanical thumps and a synthesized voice rings out behind Roland.
—Warning: intrusion detected in the underground area—
Oh. Looks like our actual "main dish" is on the stage now.
Playtime's over. You'll have to excuse me.
—Anzus
Just like earlier, Roland's whisper seems to be doing a number on Camu's hearing modules, causing great difficulty for Camu to even raise his greatsword.
Roland... You stinky...
My child. You'll understand one day.
In the end, you will walk the same path.
Hmph. Just... you wait.
Let's see how long you can keep barking like that.
Roland turns away from the incapacitated Camu and exits.
Leaving only Camu, now leaning on his greatsword, barely staying on his feet.
